title: Consider Molecular Size
text: Think about the size of the molecules. Larger molecules tend to have larger van der Waals constants.

title: Analyze Molecular Weight
text: Which gas has the highest molecular weight? Larger molecules may score higher on the 'b' constant.

title: Remember the van der Waals Equation
text: The van der Waals equation accounts for the size and attraction of molecules. 'b' is related to molecular $$\frac{volume}{size}$$.
